connect4

Class Connect4Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • connect4.Connect4Model

  • public class Connect4Model
extends java.util.Observable
    This class serves as the underlying Model for the Connect4 Program.

    Observers of a Connect4Model will be notifed of changes with each position set. The Observable.notifyObservers() method will pass an Connect4MoveMessage to Observers.

    Top left of the grid acts as the anchor at (0,0). The grid is checked for four-in-a-row after each position is set.

    Connect4Model tracks the winner throughout the game. Until a four-in-a-row is created, the winner is considered a draw, indicated by EMPTY.

    A list of all red/yellow discs in play in maintained to expedite checking the grid for a winner.

    Author:
    Caroline O'Neill
